    • Constructor Detail

      • Start

        public Start()
        Creates new form Inicio.

        Also:

        1. Creates RepeatedCharacters object
        2. Initialize components
        3. Establishes the send button as the default button
        4. Sets the icon for the frame
        5. Executes implementListener method
        6. Check the text field for the first time

    • Method Detail

      • implementListener

        private void implementListener()
        Method used to implement the listener for the txtAlphabet text field. The listener used works to verify if data has changed, removed or inserted in the text field.

      • checkAlphabet

        private void checkAlphabet(java.lang.String alphabet)
        Check the alphabet contained in the txtAlphabet text field. It does multiple actions depending on what is contained, or depending on what is uploaded with the Browse button
        Parameters:
        alphabet - The alphabet contained in the txtAlphabet text field

      • initComponents

        private void initComponents()
        This method is called from within the constructor to initialize the form. WARNING: Do NOT modify this code. The content of this method is always regenerated by the Form Editor.

      • sendButtonActionPerformed

        private void sendButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Method used to perform an action whenever the sendButton button is pressed. If the alphabet inserted is fine, it sets the alphabet and creates a CaesarFrame form.
        Parameters:
        evt - The event received to perform the action when the button is pressed

      • browseButtonActionPerformed

        private void browseButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Method used to perform an action whenever the browseButton button is pressed. It displays a FileChooser to help the user load the alphabet to the program. If an error occurs while loading, it will be displayed in the warningMessage label.
        Parameters:
        evt - The event received to perform the action when the button is pressed

      • setIcon

        private void setIcon()
        Method to set the icon for the form

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method of the Start form
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
